A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
- The movie was very good. 
- Yes had its weak spots ( Finn/Rose ) but the was a reason to go to that place - Yes\, Leia's moment was indeed bit weird but if you can forgive Ray's force use in instance I don't think that bothers much - 
Movie take an interesting turn\, which in my perspective was the logical and mature path to choose - 
Luke\, Ray\, Kylo interactions were the most interesting in the movie\, and the choices they make are the logical ones 
- And there are AWESOME moments of action
